p: Progression-free survival in relation to type of first-line therapy is shown in Figure 1A. As expected, the longest PFS was observed with FCR, whereas the median PFS in patients who received CLB was only nine months. PFS in relation to FISH results are shown in Figure 1B. Shortest PFS was observed for del(17p). Similar results were observed for type of treatment and FISH data in relation to OS ( Figure 2A and B). Notably, CLB-treated patients had a median OS of only 33 months. Survival in relation to type of hospital is shown in Figure 2C and in relation to age in Figure 2D.
